assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #633791 +++
(I'm building this release tonight; but since there is the all-hands figured I would file now, so that whenever someone is free to handle this we can likely be ready to ship)
The SeaMonkey team is preparing a beta of the next release series, SeaMonkey 2.1b3, and once again, we'd like to have the builds added to bouncer for downloads.
The relevant URL snippets for the entries to add are (bouncer and FTP):
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3&os=win /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/win32/:lang/SeaMonkey%20Setup%202.1%20Beta%203.exe
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3&os=linux /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/linux-i686/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b3.tar.bz2
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3&os=osx /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/mac/:lang/SeaMonkey%202.1%20Beta%203.dmg
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3-complete&os=win /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/update/win32/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b3.complete.mar
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3-complete&os=linux /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/update/linux-i686/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b3.complete.mar
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3-complete&os=osx /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/update/mac/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b3.complete.mar
product=seamonkey-2.1b3-partial-2.1b2&os=win /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/update/win32/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b2-2.1b3.partial.mar
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3-partial-2.1b2&os=linux /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/update/linux-i686/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b2-2.1b3.partial.mar
?product=seamonkey-2.1b3-partial-2.1b2&os=osx /seamonkey/releases/2.1b3/update/mac/:lang/seamonkey-2.1b2-2.1b3.partial.mar
Bouncer monitors locale `tr` which will not be in the b3 release, I'll fake the info for this so bouncer finds it, like was done for b2.
